REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f3196 reute r f BC-HARRIS-TEETER-PROPERT 03-16 0052

TEXT.TITLE: HARRIS-TEETER PROPERTIES <HTP> REPORTS EARNINGS
TEXT.BODY: Harris-Teeter Properties Inc reported fourth quarter fiscal 1986 earnings per share of 24 cts on earnings of 601,000 dlrs. The realty investment trust company started operations in August and had no comparable figures, it said. Reuter
